context: Is Ps4 game region locked? Will i be able to play this game on Indian PS4 (PAL)?

context: what is steam drm ?
response: Digital Restrictions Management is technology that controls what you can do with the digital media and devices you own. When a program doesn't let you share a song, read an ebook on another device, or play a single-player game without an internet connection, you are being restricted by DRM.

context: Will these still fit snugly and not slip off easily if the original joystick cover has completely come off?
response: No. At least not for an Xbox 360 controller. If the original joystick cover has torn completely off, these fit fairly loosely and rub against the analog stick housing and make the stick harder to move.

context: Is this compatible with the DS lite?

context: Do you need a cable to plug it in to the Xbox, or does it plug in directly?

context: What makes these worth $90+???
response: I don't know why it says $90 atm. They were around $5 when I bought them through amazon. They are worth the $5 but not $90 lol.

context: Does it work with the ps3 slim?
response: yes I have one

context: Does this come with X & Y games as well as the 3DS?
response: No. Its just the console.  Games are separate

context: What controllers the sonic colors use
response: The regular hand held controllers.

context: can this controller be used for all ps3 games
response: Yes it can be used for all controller. Be warn That the joysticks are small. And the triggers are super sentive so you have to push all the way down on them.

context: My friend has a Wii that is 4 or 5 years old.  Would her remote and nunchuck work on this system if I bought it?  Thanks!!
response: Yes Nintendo did not change compatibility with wii models.

context: Is this the whole game or just a code for items?
response: It's the entire game.

context: I would like to know if there is any lag? I play Ultra Street Fighter IV and a game like that requires quick response time.
response: Hey, Sorry for the long delay, your email was in a messy inbox ;) There is no lag at all. We played few games and none of us complained.

context: I'm sure it won't but will this fit with a plastic case already around a 3DS XL? Please only answer if you know. Thank you.
response: The Dreamgear fits skin-tight so, no, it won't fit over a protective plastic case without stretching too much and possibly tearing.

context: Does the game used $ 83 brings beanie of Delsin?
response: It should, it would be rude for the seller not to include it. I got my copy at gamestop. I'd check there and other places before buying it used.

context: Since it's from Germany .. is this game in English?   Only info is Region 2/PAL.The box doesn't indicate and there's German printing... thanks
response: Hey I had the same thing and I was worried about opening it, but it's started in English and has a ton of language options which was cool cause I can work on my Spanish while playing around

context: Does this game includes the season pass to download the 4 new maps?
response: No. You must be able to buy the season pass seperatley or buy the dlc packs individually. There 15$ a piece. They all have 4 maps and a new extinction map. A couple come with guns. I bought this and had to buy them as well.

context: does the scroll wheel have a page forward, page back left and right thing?
response: Yes, the scroll wheel allows you to scroll up/down and left/right

context: Do you have to use two feet to gas/brake because there's a post going down the middle?
response: I had to use both feet.  Unless you find a way to turn it more one way than the other.

context: is there a way to get this installed through steam?
response: I have no idea.

context: Is this the one that includes the base game sims 3 and sims 3 pets? I saw a cover just like this but this doesn't say it includes both
response: No. This is just an expansion pack. You still need the base game for this to work.

context: May I use it in Guatemala?
response: The new PSN prepaid game cards only need a valid Amazon Account and your email address. You buy the card on line via your Amazon Account and you will get the code in your email address, regardless where you are.

context: Which game cartridges will play on this ds??  Will ds xl work?
response: This gaming system can play DS games as well as 3DS games.  All DS games should work in this system.

context: Can one headphone be removed to leave one ear open while using the headphones?
response: You could, but you'll have problems keeping the headset on properly. I usually just put the cup behind my ear if I want to keep one uncovered.

context: it really has all of the mgs games from mgs1 to mgs4? including snake eater?
response: Yes, MGS3; Snake Eater is on there. It's a great game, too.

context: I am thinking of buying the physical copy (since the pc download feature seems unavailable.) If i get the physical copy can i use it on steam?
response: ON the occasions Steam is available, and after Steam spends five minutes or so loading 'updates' and various malware. Avoid this game.

context: Can I use this without redeeming it on steam? Will it still unlock on my local computer?
response: It is a download and because the game uses steam to save to your computer, you will need to use steam in order to download it. Sorry if this is not a good thing for you:(

context: Does the PC version of the game support manual saves or is it checkpoint only?
response: You can click to save, but I don't believe it will save it right there, I do believe it will just return you to the checkpoint. I could be wrong though, I usually just use the checkpoints haha

context: I have a macbook and heard this would work on a mac...it has a mini disk. does not work. is there a driver i can install/donwload?
response: yes. my computer actually auto-downloaded the drivers(windows, sorry). google 3 in 1 magic joy box drivers and you should get there.

context: wait does this have 250gb on it
response: Yes it does although roughly 30gb or so is used for the xbox operating system, etc

context: MAN IT DOESN WORK THE CODE
response: It works with my USA PSN account

context: Is this ok for a 13 year old?  I'm not too concerned with blood or fighting...mostly wondering about language or nudity/sexual content
response: Yea it's ok it's very rare for it to have sexual or language scenes plus it shows historical events of the pirate era

context: will this work with windows 7?
response: I DON'T KNOW               BUT IT DOES NOT WORK WITH WINDOWS 8

context: How long is the Cord on this Headset, I sit about 10 feet away from My TV ..is it long enough to reach 10ft??
response: Just measured it and it's a bit over 12 feet so you're good to go.

context: Would it work on a Xbox One?
response: I think you need to buy an Xbox one adapter. I only used this for my xbox 360.

context: Would this work with a Macbook Air?
response: I do not know

context: How can I extend cable length? Standard 2.0 usb extension won't work. Won't let controller connect, only when plugged direct
response: Make sure you have a proper cable with a repeater on it. I am a side photographer and get my cables from tether tools on amazon. I'm able to use it and keep the adapter high on my house for best conection.

context: What is the little key and pink fish thing that came with this?
response: You mean the gifts inside? The product came with a lot of gifts such as USB flash drive, phone decorative stickers, and so on. It also contained a white rubber fish, but I didn't know how could it be used.

context: Am I right when I see that there are two (2) controlers for $12.50 price?
response: Yes, there are two of them for that price!

context: Is this game easier or harder than the wii's Donkey Kong?
response: I personally think its about the same maybe a little more easy. you get to choose between more characters to utilize their special powers. But all in all its another fun donkey kong game. I really like it.

context: Is Polk Audio 4Shot Headphone - Black - Xbox One wireless?
response: No it is not. It connects to the Xbox Stereo headset adapter. It is however, only wired by a small headphone jack and no power cables or batteries.

context: will this clamp to a desk?
response: Yes, it does clamp to a desk. It's pretty easy after you figure out how you need to do it. It's very stable as well.

context: Can you buy the dark characters seperate from the starter pack? I have the Swap Force game and portal but want to buy the dark characters?
response: I haven't seen any of the dark characters sold separately.

context: does it work for the xbox 1
response: It does work but you will need to purchase the xbox one chat adapter to be able to use the microphone.

context: How long is the cable? Is it braided?
response: The cable is 2 meters (6.6 ft) long, and is braided.  It looks nice.

context: WIll this work with xbox?
response: My kids use it on their ps3 but I believe they work with xbox and wii. You just need the right portal for your console

context: Does the controller have the gyroscope feature?
response: Not sure about that unless you mean the two thumb controllers that rotate sorta like a gyroscope. It also has a turbo feature.
